name.title: Name
name.description: Captures the name of a malware instance or malware family and the relative confidence of the name.

value.description: Captures the name of the malware instance or malware family.

source.description: Captures the source of the value property (i.e., the name).

confidence.description: Captures the relative confidence in the accuracy of the assigned name. The value for this property SHOULD come from the confidence-measure-ov vocabulary.
